verses.verse: וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> happened מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass at the end שְׁנָתַ֣יִם <WH8141> years יָמִ֑ים <WH3117> of two full וּפַרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> that Pharaoh חֹלֵ֔ם <WH2492> dreamed וְהִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> and behold עֹמֵ֥ד <WH5975> and behold he stood עַל־ <WH5921> by הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> by the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and lo מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיְאֹ֗ר <WH2975> out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <WH5927> And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> kine יְפ֥וֹת <WH3303> well מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> favoured וּבְרִיאֹ֣ת <WH1277> and fat בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> and they וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <WH260> in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> behold שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> And behold seven פָּר֣וֹת <WH6510> kine אֲחֵר֗וֹת <WH312> other עֹל֤וֹת <WH5927> came up אַחֲרֵיהֶן֙ <WH310> after them מִן־ <WH4480> from הַיְאֹ֔ר <WH2975> out of the river רָע֥וֹת <WH7451> ill מַרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> favoured וְדַקּ֣וֹת <WH1851> dwarf בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> and they וַֽתַּעֲמֹ֛דְנָה <WH5975> and stood אֵ֥צֶל <WH681> by הַפָּר֖וֹת <WH6510> the [other] kine עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> upon the brink הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> of the river

וַתֹּאכַ֣לְנָה <WH398> did eat up הַפָּר֗וֹת <WH6510> kine רָע֤וֹת <WH7451> And the ill הַמַּרְאֶה֙ <WH4758> favoured וְדַקֹּ֣ת <WH1851> dwarf הַבָּשָׂ֔ר <WH1320> body אֵ֚ת <WH853> שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> the seven הַפָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> kine יְפֹ֥ת <WH3303> well הַמַּרְאֶ֖ה <WH4758> favoured וְהַבְּרִיאֹ֑ת <WH1277> and fat וַיִּיקַ֖ץ <WH3364> awoke פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> So Pharaoh

וַיִּישָׁ֕ן <WH3462> And he slept וַֽיַּחֲלֹ֖ם <WH2492> and dreamed שֵׁנִ֑ית <WH8145> the second time וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <WH7641> ears of corn עֹל֛וֹת <WH5927> came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> stalk אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> upon one בְּרִיא֥וֹת <WH1277> rank וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH2896> and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> ears דַּקּ֖וֹת <WH1851> thin וּשְׁדוּפֹ֣ת <WH7710> and blasted קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <WH6779> sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽן׃ <WH310> after them

וַתִּבְלַ֙עְנָה֙ <WH1104> devoured הַשִּׁבֳּלִ֣ים <WH7641> ears הַדַּקּ֔וֹת <WH1851> And the seven thin אֵ֚ת <WH853> שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> the seven הַֽשִּׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> ears הַבְּרִיא֖וֹת <WH1277> rank וְהַמְּלֵא֑וֹת <WH4392> and full וַיִּיקַ֥ץ <WH3364> awoke פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh וְהִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> and behold חֲלֽוֹם׃ <WH2472> and behold [it was] a dream

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become בַבֹּ֙קֶר֙ <WH1242> And it came to pass in the morning וַתִּפָּ֣עֶם <WH6470> was troubled רוּח֔וֹ <WH7307> that his spirit וַיִּשְׁלַ֗ח <WH7971> and he sent וַיִּקְרָ֛א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> for all חַרְטֻמֵּ֥י <WH2748> for all the magicians מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְאֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all חֲכָמֶ֑יהָ <WH2450> and all the wise men וַיְסַפֵּ֨ר <WH5608> told פַּרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> thereof and Pharaoh לָהֶם֙ אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלֹמ֔וֹ <WH2472> them his dream וְאֵין־ <WH369> there פּוֹתֵ֥ר <WH6622> but [there was] none that could interpret אוֹתָ֖ם <WH853> לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> them unto Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> Then spake שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <WH4945> cupbearer אֶת־ <WH854> for פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אֶת־ <WH853> חֲטָאַ֕י <WH2399> my faults אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I מַזְכִּ֥יר <WH2142> I do remember הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> this day

פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> Pharaoh קָצַ֣ף <WH7107> was wroth עַל־ <WH5921> with עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> with his servants וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> and put אֹתִ֜י <WH853> בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <WH4929> me in ward בֵּ֚ית <WH1004> house שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> in the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> of the guard's אֹתִ֕י <WH853> וְאֵ֖ת <WH853> שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> [both] me and the chief הָאֹפִֽים׃ <WH644> baker

וַנַּֽחַלְמָ֥ה <WH2492> And we dreamed חֲל֛וֹם <WH2472> a dream בְּלַ֥יְלָה <WH3915> night אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in one אֲנִ֣י <WH589> I וָה֑וּא <WH1931> and I אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> each man כְּפִתְר֥וֹן <WH6623> according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <WH2472> of his dream חָלָֽמְנוּ׃ <WH2492> I and he we dreamed

וְשָׁ֨ם <WH8033> there אִתָּ֜נוּ <WH854> for נַ֣עַר <WH5288> And [there was] there with us a young man עִבְרִ֗י <WH5680> an Hebrew עֶ֚בֶד <WH5650> servant לְשַׂ֣ר <WH8269> to the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֔ים <WH2876> of the guard וַנְּ֨סַפֶּר־ <WH5608> and we told ל֔וֹ וַיִּפְתָּר־ <WH6622> him and he interpreted לָ֖נוּ אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלֹמֹתֵ֑ינוּ <WH2472> to us our dreams אִ֥ישׁ <WH582> according כַּחֲלֹמ֖וֹ <WH2472> according to his dream פָּתָֽר׃ <WH6622> he did interpret

וַיְהִ֛י <WH1961> happened כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he פָּֽתַר־ <WH6622> And it came to pass as he interpreted לָ֖נוּ כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> so הָיָ֑ה <WH1961> happened אֹתִ֛י <WH853> הֵשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> to us so it was me he restored עַל־ <WH5921> in כַּנִּ֖י <WH3653> unto mine office וְאֹת֥וֹ <WH853> תָלָֽה׃ <WH8518> and him he hanged

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> Then Pharaoh וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> and called אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> Joseph וַיְרִיצֻ֖הוּ <WH7323> and they brought him hastily מִן־ <WH4480> out הַבּ֑וֹר <WH953> out of the dungeon וַיְגַלַּח֙ <WH1548> and he shaved וַיְחַלֵּ֣ף <WH2498> [himself] and changed שִׂמְלֹתָ֔יו <WH8071> his raiment וַיָּבֹ֖א <WH935> and came in אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> unto Pharaoh

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> a dream חָלַ֔מְתִּי <WH2492> I have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <WH6622> and [there is] none that can interpret אֵ֣ין <WH369> no אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> I שָׁמַ֤עְתִּי <WH8085> it and I have heard עָלֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH5921> about לֵאמֹ֔ר <WH559> say תִּשְׁמַ֥ע <WH8085> of thee [that] thou canst understand חֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> a dream לִפְתֹּ֥ר <WH6622> to interpret אֹתֽוֹ׃ <WH853>

וַיַּ֨עַן <WH6030> answered יוֹסֵ֧ף <WH3130> And Joseph אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֛ה <WH6547> Pharaoh לֵאמֹ֖ר <WH559> saying בִּלְעָדָ֑י <WH1107> [It is] not in me אֱלֹהִ֕ים <WH430> God יַעֲנֶ֖ה <WH6030> an answer אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁל֥וֹם <WH7965> of peace פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> Pharaoh

וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> said פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> unto Joseph בַּחֲלֹמִ֕י <WH2472> In my dream הִנְנִ֥י <WH2005> behold עֹמֵ֖ד <WH5975> behold I stood עַל־ <WH5921> on שְׂפַ֥ת <WH8193> upon the bank הַיְאֹֽר׃ <WH2975> of the river

וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold מִן־ <WH4480> out הַיְאֹ֗ר <WH2975> out of the river עֹלֹת֙ <WH5927> And behold there came up שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> seven פָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> kine בְּרִיא֥וֹת <WH1277> fat בָּשָׂ֖ר <WH1320> body וִיפֹ֣ת <WH3303> and well תֹּ֑אַר <WH8389> favoured וַתִּרְעֶ֖ינָה <WH7462> and they fed בָּאָֽחוּ׃ <WH260> in a meadow

וְהִנֵּ֞ה <WH2009> Lo שֶֽׁבַע־ <WH7651> And behold seven פָּר֤וֹת <WH6510> kine אֲחֵרוֹת֙ <WH312> other עֹל֣וֹת <WH5927> came up אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH310> after them דַּלּ֨וֹת <WH1803> poor וְרָע֥וֹת <WH7451> ill תֹּ֛אַר <WH8389> favoured מְאֹ֖ד <WH3966> and very וְרַקּ֣וֹת <WH7534> thin בָּשָׂ֑ר <WH1320> I לֹֽא־ <WH3808> as I never רָאִ֧יתִי <WH7200> saw כָהֵ֛נָּה <WH2007> such בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> in all the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt לָרֹֽעַ׃ <WH7455> for badness

וַתֹּאכַ֙לְנָה֙ <WH398> did eat up הַפָּר֔וֹת <WH6510> kine הָרַקּ֖וֹת <WH7534> And the lean וְהָרָע֑וֹת <WH7451> and the ill favoured אֵ֣ת <WH853> שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> seven הַפָּר֛וֹת <WH6510> kine הָרִאשֹׁנ֖וֹת <WH7223> the first הַבְּרִיאֹֽת׃ <WH1277> fat

וַתָּבֹ֣אנָה <WH935> abide אֶל־ <WH413> about קִרְבֶּ֗נָה <WH7130> among וְלֹ֤א <WH3808> could נוֹדַע֙ <WH3045> it could not be known כִּי־ <WH3588> for בָ֣אוּ <WH935> abide אֶל־ <WH413> about קִרְבֶּ֔נָה <WH7130> among וּמַרְאֵיהֶ֣ן <WH4758> but they [were] still רַ֔ע <WH7451> ill favoured כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> as בַּתְּחִלָּ֑ה <WH8462> as at the beginning וָאִיקָֽץ׃ <WH3364> So I awoke

וָאֵ֖רֶא <WH7200> And I saw בַּחֲלֹמִ֑י <WH2472> in my dream וְהִנֵּ֣ה ׀ <WH2009> and behold שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> and behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֗ים <WH7641> ears עֹלֹ֛ת <WH5927> came up בְּקָנֶ֥ה <WH7070> stalk אֶחָ֖ד <WH259> in one מְלֵאֹ֥ת <WH4392> full וְטֹבֽוֹת׃ <WH2896> and good

וְהִנֵּה֙ <WH2009> and lo שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> And behold seven שִׁבֳּלִ֔ים <WH7641> ears צְנֻמ֥וֹת <WH6798> withered דַּקּ֖וֹת <WH1851> thin שְׁדֻפ֣וֹת <WH7710> [and] blasted קָדִ֑ים <WH6921> with the east wind צֹמְח֖וֹת <WH6779> sprung up אַחֲרֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH310> after them

וַתִּבְלַ֙עְןָ֙ <WH1104> devoured הָשִׁבֳּלִ֣ים <WH7641> ears הַדַּקֹּ֔ת <WH1851> And the thin אֵ֛ת <WH853> שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> the seven הַֽשִׁבֳּלִ֖ים <WH7641> ears הַטֹּב֑וֹת <WH2896> good וָֽאֹמַר֙ <WH559> and I told אֶל־ <WH413> to הַֽחַרְטֻמִּ֔ים <WH2748> [this] unto the magicians וְאֵ֥ין <WH369> there מַגִּ֖יד <WH5046> but [there was] none that could declare לִֽי׃

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh חֲל֥וֹם <WH2472> The dream פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh אֶחָ֣ד <WH259> [is] one ה֑וּא <WH1931> he אֵ֣ת <WH853> אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> and הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> God עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> what he [is] about to do הִגִּ֥יד <WH5046> hath shewed לְפַרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> Pharaoh

שֶׁ֧בַע <WH7651> The seven פָּרֹ֣ת <WH6510> kine הַטֹּבֹ֗ת <WH2896> good שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> [are] seven שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in וְשֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> and the seven הַֽשִּׁבֳּלִים֙ <WH7641> ears הַטֹּבֹ֔ת <WH2896> good שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> [are] seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years הֵ֑נָּה <WH2007> in חֲל֖וֹם <WH2472> the dream אֶחָ֥ד <WH259> [is] one הֽוּא׃ <WH1931> he

וְשֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> And the seven הַ֠פָּרוֹת <WH6510> kine הָֽרַקּ֨וֹת <WH7534> thin וְהָרָעֹ֜ת <WH7451> and ill favoured הָעֹלֹ֣ת <WH5927> that came up אַחֲרֵיהֶ֗ן <WH310> after them שֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> [are] seven שָׁנִים֙ <WH8141> years הֵ֔נָּה <WH2007> in וְשֶׁ֤בַע <WH7651> and the seven הַֽשִׁבֳּלִים֙ <WH7641> ears הָרֵק֔וֹת <WH7386> empty שְׁדֻפ֖וֹת <WH7710> blasted הַקָּדִ֑ים <WH6921> with the east wind יִהְי֕וּ <WH1961> become שֶׁ֖בַע <WH7651> shall be seven שְׁנֵ֥י <WH8141> years רָעָֽב׃ <WH7458> of famine

ה֣וּא <WH1931> he הַדָּבָ֔ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> what דִּבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> which I have spoken אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֑ה <WH6547> unto Pharaoh אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> what הָאֱלֹהִ֛ים <WH430> What God עֹשֶׂ֖ה <WH6213> [is] about to do הֶרְאָ֥ה <WH7200> he sheweth אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> unto Pharaoh

הִנֵּ֛ה <WH2009> Behold שֶׁ֥בַע <WH7651> seven שָׁנִ֖ים <WH8141> years בָּא֑וֹת <WH935> Behold there come שָׂבָ֥ע <WH7647> plenty גָּד֖וֹל <WH1419> of great בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all אֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וְ֠קָמוּ <WH6965> And there shall arise שֶׁ֨בַע <WH7651> seven שְׁנֵ֤י <WH8141> years רָעָב֙ <WH7458> of famine אַחֲרֵיהֶ֔ן <WH310> after them וְנִשְׁכַּ֥ח <WH7911> shall be forgotten כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הַשָּׂבָ֖ע <WH7647> and all the plenty בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְכִלָּ֥ה <WH3615> shall consume הָרָעָ֖ב <WH7458> and the famine אֶת־ <WH853> הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> the land

וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> not יִוָּדַ֤ע <WH3045> shall not be known הַשָּׂבָע֙ <WH7647> And the plenty בָּאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> in the land מִפְּנֵ֛י <WH6440> by reason הָרָעָ֥ב <WH7458> of that famine הַה֖וּא <WH1931> of that אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> subsequent כֵ֑ן <WH3651> after that כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for כָבֵ֥ד <WH3515> grievous ה֖וּא <WH1931> he מְאֹֽד׃ <WH3966> for it [shall be] very
